title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Adam Grant Says 1 Small Change Makes You 3X More Likely to Keep Your New Year’s Resolutions
items.description: The psychologist, and 27 other studies, agree this change in viewing your goals could triple your chance of reaching them.

items.title: A class-action lawsuit against McDonald’s boldly asks: Is the McRib really rib?
items.description: McDonald’s limited-time McRib sandwich is a cultural icon . And like any item of its ilk, it’s divisive. On the one hand, the saucy, vaguely rib-esque...

items.title: Trump’s strike on Venezuela gives the U.S. 30% of the world’s oil reserves on paper and a $100 billion rebuilding job in reality
items.description: “I don't think any large U.S. major company is going to want to invest without a series of guarantees,” one historian of Venezuela said.

items.title: President Trump stands ready to send U.S. Big Oil into Venezuela en masse, but the messy reality of rebuilding a ruined industry takes many years
items.description: Doubling Venezuela's weakened oil flows could cost $110 billion and take until 2030.

items.title: The Real Reason High-Performing Leaders Feel Exhausted, Even When They’re Doing Everything Right
items.description: What executives are missing about sustainable performance.

items.title: This Fun Activity May Be the 1 Best Thing You Can Do for Your Brain, Neuroscientists Say
items.description: You’ll reduce your risk of heart disease and dementia as well.

items.title: ChatGPT Is Changing How You Communicate—Here’s Why That’s Dangerous
items.description: People are starting to disregard AI slop and content that resembles it. There’s a simple way your content can avoid that fate.

items.title: Why You Should Use the People’s Names When You Talk to Them, Backed by Neuroscience
items.description: Research shows occasionally using the other person’s name can make the conversation more meaningful, memorable, and impactful.

items.title: Trump tells NBC U.S. may reimburse firms for Venezuela oil efforts
